scripts.test:a: npm run build && rm -rf data/ && PORT=3001 node --experimental-sqlite dist/server.js & sleep 2 && tsx tests/phase_a.test.ts; kill %1 2>/dev/null
scripts.test:b: npm run build && rm -rf data/ && PORT=3001 node --experimental-sqlite dist/server.js & sleep 2 && tsx tests/phase_b.test.ts; kill %1 2>/dev/null
scripts.test:c: npm run build && rm -rf data/ && PORT=4001 node --experimental-sqlite dist/server.js & sleep 2 && tsx tests/phase_c.test.ts; kill %1 2>/dev/null
scripts.test:d: npm run build && rm -rf data/ && PORT=5001 node --experimental-sqlite dist/server.js & sleep 2 && tsx tests/phase_d.test.ts; kill %1 2>/dev/null
scripts.test:e: npm run build && rm -rf data/ && PORT=6001 node --experimental-sqlite dist/server.js & sleep 2 && tsx tests/phase_e.test.ts; kill %1 2>/dev/null
scripts.test: npm run test:a && npm run test:b && npm run test:c && npm run test:d && npm run test:e
